channel.title: Advice
channel.description:
While this may be the last place I would go for advice on this topic, I have no firsts. So here goes.
So I like this girl on the XC team and who I have 3 classes with (who I sit next to in 1) and it's not that I'm socially awkward, its just that I have no idea what to talk to her about. Like in the hall, what kinda things could I say that aren't related to sports, school, or the weather? My mind goes fcking blank.
Here's the catch. Ive liked her since last year and a bunch of people (including herself) found out, so I can't seem to flirty. I can talk to her fine if theres another person in the conversation, just not alone.
Advice? And please don't over troll me....

item.title: Advice
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:724, topic:414624”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=516587.msg3986176#msg3986176 date=1335915188]
How about talk to her and be happy to be friends rather than hope to become more? I talk to plenty of girls with no intention of dating any of them. If it does go further then be happy, but don’t expect it to develop into a relationship.
[/quote]

We are pretty good friends. She thinks of me as a friend (hopefully more) and I find her to be a fun, weird crazy person. I have plenty of females friends who I have no intention of having any sort of relationship.[/quote]
GET ALONG WITH IT REY, RISK IT FOR THE BISKIT!!!

Read full topic

item.description:

  1. All progress you need to know ie above
  2. Will only ask her on a date after she goes to prom with other guy, otherwise that could get weird
  3. Highschool, not college
  4. He’s not serious, just wanted to take her to prom then an after party
  5. She does dumb shit when wasted

Yea.
[/quote]fuck her fuck him ask her to get drunk n fuck

I’m not gonna take advantage of a drunk girl I actually care about…
[/quote] you dont take advantage shit starts to pop off when your drinkin pussy grow a pair

I’m guessing your single? and have been single for a long ass time now?[/quote]
Quite a lot of the time I’ve noticed a girl wants you to take charge actually. I’m not a take charge kinda guy and I end up regretting it a lot of the time. But theres a fine line of course. (not arguing against you, just saying what the other guy could’ve said instead of that crap).

item.title: Advice
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you’re still getting along with her well just ask her to a movie or something. I have no idea what has gone on in the past 500 posts so not sure exactly where you’re at anymore…

Just had prom yesterday. I’m kind of unstable where I stand for liking her as more than just a prom date. She asked me to the prom, not sure if it was because she likes me or just to have a date. We work together too. Our prom group was pretty awkward (I went with her friends and I have talked to them about five times each in my entire high school career). I’d continue on with the story but it could probably get pretty lengthy with me adding all the details, and I don’t want to hijack the thread already.

Read full topic
